name: randomize
description:
Seeds the pseudo-random number generator with an
 integer number, ensuring repeatable number patterns.

params.name: algorithm
params.description: The algorithm to use to generated the random number.

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: The following example calls the Randomize function to seed the random number generator and generates 10 random numbers.
examples.code:
<cfset randomize(12345)> <!--- if one was to remove this line, the random numbers are different every time ---> 
 <cfloop index="i" from="1" to="10"> 
 <cfoutput>#rand()#</cfoutput> 
 </cfloop>
